original: Bohlin, Card Gösta, läroverksadjunkt, Borås, f. 18/2/06 i Borås av iläro-v:adj. Hans Otto B. o. Frida Maria Engman. G. 36 m. Märta von Fniesen. Barn: Margareta f. 37, Otto 43. — Stud:ex. i Borås 24, fil. kand. 30, fil. mag. 31, provår v. Gbgs folksk:sem. 33. E. o. lär. i Borås 30-31, Huskvarna 32, Borås 34-35, ord. ämneslär. i Kinna 36, adj. i matematik, fysik o. kemi v. Kinna is’amreal.s.k. 45-47, rektor v. Kinna kommuns yrkessk. 43-46, adj. i matem. o. fys. v. Borås h. a. 1. sed. 47.
translated: Bohlin, Card Gösta, high school teacher, Borås, b. 18/2/06 in Borås, son of elementary school teacher-vice principal Hans Otto B. and Frida Maria Engman. Married in 1936 to Märta von Fniesen. Children: Margareta b. 1937, Otto b. 1943. Studied at high school in Borås (graduated 1924), received a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1930, Master of Arts degree in 1931, worked as a trainee at Gothenburg's People's College in 1933. Acting teacher in Borås in 1930-31, Huskvarna in 1932, Borås in 1934-35. Regular subject teacher in Kinna in 1936, mathematics, physics and chemistry teacher at Kinna's secondary school in 1945-47, principal of Kinna's vocational school in 1943-46, adjunct professor of mathematics and physics at Borås High School from 1947.
